QuestData.Title: Mighty Grokkfist
QuestData.Description:
Grandma is always telling me I need to toughen up a little... how easy we've got it these days.
I read a story about giants that are terrified of rats, so I thought, "Hey Charles, here's a great idea, let's take all those rats $p gathered and let 'em loose on the ettins."
I tried to be tough for once, but look how it turned out. Now, I'm stuck out here, just hoping I don't get squashed.
Their leader is just up the hill there. Here, take the rats with you and let's hope I was right!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Pack of Rats to kill Grokkfist.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Charles Davenport back in Millstone Hamlet.
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe it actually worked. I thought for sure we'd all be squished!
